block.p: BASEBALL

Major League Baseball MLB--Reduced the suspension of Detroit Tigers 1B-C Robert Fick from five games to four for his participation in the April 22 brawl with the Chicago White Sox. The suspension begins May 23. Major League Baseball Players Association MLBPA--Named Nancy Willis category manager for licensed apparel.
BASEBALL

Major League Baseball MLB--Reduced the suspension of Detroit Tigers 1B-C Robert Fick from five games to four for his participation in the April 22 brawl with the Chicago White Sox. The suspension begins May 23. Major League Baseball Players Association MLBPA--Named Nancy Willis category manager for licensed apparel.

American League BOSTON RED SOX--Activated 3B John Valentin from the 15-day disabled list. Optioned INF Andy Sheets to Pawtucket of the International League. CLEVELAND INDIANS--Designated RHP Scott Sanders for assignment. Purchased the contract of RHP Paul Rigdon from Buffalo of the International League. DETROIT TIGERS--Activated RHP Brian Moehler from the 15-day disabled list. Placed RHP Mark Johnson on the 15-day disabled list. Optioned RHP Masao Kida to Toledo of the International League. Called up RHP Brandon Villafuerte from Toledo. NEW YORK YANKEES--Placed SS Derek Jeter on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled INF Alfonso Soriano from Columbus of the International League. SEATTLE MARINERS-- Activated OF Rickey Henderson and optioned RHP Kevin Hodges to Tacoma of the Pacific Coast League. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Purchased the contracts of RHP Darwin Cubillan and OF-DH Todd Greene from Syracuse of the International League. Optioned SS Chris Woodward to Syracuse. Designated LHP Eric Gunderson and Syracuse 3B Casey Blake for assignment. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Recalled RHP Billy Taylor from Durham of the International League. Optioned RHP Jeff Sparks to Durham.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed C Brayan Pena to a minor league contract. FLORIDA MARLINS--Placed RHP Alex Fernandez on the 15-day disabled list. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Placed C Tyler Houston on the 15-day disabled list. Recalled C Raul Casanova Indianapolis of the International League. MONTREAL EXPOS--Signed LHP Jim Poole. PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Announced LHP Trever Miller has been claimed off waivers by the Los Angeles Dodgers. Recalled RHP Steve Schrenk from Scranton-Wilkes Barre of the International League. PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Agreed to terms with OF Brian Giles on a contract extension through the 2005 season.
BASKETBALL

United States Basketball League FLORIDA SEA DRAGONS--Signed F Andre Perry. Activated G Mark Jones from the inactive list. Placed G Roberto Herrera and G Carl Boyd on the inactive list. OKLAHOMA STORM--Signed F Ira Newble. Placed G Darren McClinton, G Bubb Wells and F Galen Young on the inactive list. PENNSYLVANIA VALLEYDAWGS--Signed C Stefan Ciosici. Placed G Anthony Stacey on the inactive list.
Southwest Basketball League SBL--Announced the creation of the women's Southwest Basketball League.
FOOTBALL

National Football League NFL--Fined the Pittsburgh Steelers $150,000 and the loss of their 2001 third-round draft pick and ordered them to pay retired OL Will Wolford for a salary cap violation. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Named Jeremy Green pro personnel scout. DENVER BRONCOS--Signed C Jason Johnson. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Announced the resignation of vice president and general counsel Lance Lopes. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Signed S Erik Olson. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Named Robert Bass player programs director. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Waived G Kendell Mack, LB Matt Beck, C Seneca Gray and LB Rashaun Matthews. NEW YORK JETS--Waived WR Eric Granger. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Re-signed FB Reggie Brown to a multiyear contract. WASHINGTON REDSKINS--Signed WR Ethan Howell to a three-year contract.
HOCKEY
National Hockey League CAROLINA HURRICANES--Agreed to terms with F Brent McDonald and F Jaroslav Svoboda on multiyear contracts.
HORSE RACING

New York Racing Association BELMONT PARK STEWARDS--Suspended trainer Lisa Aitchison for 60 days because a prohibited substance was found in the post-race urine of one of the horses in her care and have referred the matter to the New York State Racing and Wagering Board for further review.
SOCCER
Major League Soccer NEW YORK-NEW JERSEY METROSTARS--Traded MF Brian Kelly to Los Angeles for F Roy Myers.
TENNIS
United States Tennis Association USTA--Announced the resignation of Robert L. Gebbie, chief financial officer and director of administration.
COLLEGE

ARKANSAS-LITTLE ROCK--Named Porter Moser men's basketball coach. AUBURN--Named Kevin Renshler women's volleyball coach. OKLAHOMA BAPTIST--Announced the resignation of Scott Norris, women's basketball coach, to become a women's assistant basketball coach at Southwest Missouri State. SAN DIEGO--Named Steve Flint men's assistant basketball coach. SOUTH CAROLINA--Announced sophomore basketball F Damien Kinloch will transfer to Tennessee Tech. TREVECCA NAZARENE--Named Jeff Forehand baseball coach.
